article.title: Rockwell Collins to Provide Real-Time Cockpit Data
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins Incorporated, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $10,094,151 contract modification to exercise an option for the procurement of 81 RT-1990(C)/ARC receiver-transmitters for C-130H real-time information in the cockpit. In addition, this option provides for the procurement of 74 MT-6567/ARC mounting bases; 74 MT-7006/ARC amplifier mounts; 81 AM-7526/ARC high- power amplifiers; and 81 MX-11745/ARC low-noise amplifier diplexers with high-power radio frequency switches. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
